TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Ah! The scroll I was curious about reading slipped from my grasp from that fall!
SOLANUM: Oh dear, I must have dropped it into the pool.. I must try to retrieve it before I leave!

SOLANUM: Ow, ow, ow... The long, electrifying tentacles of the pool's inhabitant appear to be inconveniently guarding the scroll at the bottom of the pool; I received a painful shock trying to swim under it..

SOLANUM: Oh.. I deeply apologize for polluting your home, my friend. I.. I shall seek Bells' help in retrieving that scroll from your dwelling immediately, once I have completed my quantum pilgrimage today.

SOLANUM: If anyone that sees this recording knows of a way to cause the tentacled species to rise so the scroll can be safely retrieved, I would be grateful if you would kindly retrieve it in my place!
